hero.title: Hi, I'm
hero.subtitle: FullStack Developer building accessible and delightful web experiences.

about.subtitle: Learn about my journey and what drives me as a developer
paragraphs: Hi! I'm Sara, a developer passionate about building digital experiences that make a difference. With a degree in Information Systems and hands-on experience, I specialize in creating modern, scalable web solutions.

My journey into development began with curiosity and evolved into a genuine passion for solving complex problems through code. I believe the best technology improves people's lives in intuitive and elegant ways.
When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community.

timeline.title: Fullstack Development Intern
timeline.description: Worked on backend with Java and Spring Boot, building REST APIs, testing with JUnit and integrating with Kafka and AWS. Also involved in frontend development with React and TypeScript.

timeline.title: Back-End Java Developer
timeline.description: Built APIs with Spring Boot, used microservices and architectural best practices. Implemented unit tests and optimized code.

timeline.title: Web Developer (Intern)
timeline.description: Developed responsive landing pages with HTML, CSS and JavaScript, focusing on UX and accessibility.

timeline.title: Junior Apprentice â€” Engineering Quality
timeline.description: Worked on engineering quality: creating and organizing scripts to automate checks, training teams on the internal platform and preparing documentation to standardize processes.

contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? Let's talk and turn your ideas into reality!
contact.workWithMeText:
I'm always open to discuss new projects, creative ideas or opportunities to be part of your vision. Whether it's a quick chat or a long-term engagement, I'd love to hear from you.
I have experience with remote projects and async collaboration â€” feel free to send a summary of your project.

availability.title: Availability
availability.description: Open to freelance opportunities and remote roles. Let's talk about how I can help with your project.

toasts.success: Message sent successfully! I'll get back to you soon.
toasts.error: Failed to send the message. Please try again later.
